parameters.name: PartialEdgeFilletData
parameters.description: IPartialEdgeFilletData ; null to remove existing partial edge fillet data from FilletItem

title: ISimpleFilletFeatureData2.SetPartialEdgeFilletData
description: Sets the partial edge fillet data for the specified edge.
signature:
System.Boolean SetPartialEdgeFilletData( 
   System.Object
FilletItem
,
   System.Object
PartialEdgeFilletData
)

parameters.name: PartialEdgeFilletData
parameters.description: IPartialEdgeFilletData ; null to remove existing partial edge fillet data from FilletItem

returns: True if partial edge fillet data successfully set, false if not
remarks:
This method is valid only if
ISimpleFilletFeatureData2::EnablePartialEdgeParameters
is true.
